pakisthanaye sitina brithya guwanwiduli (bi. bi. si.) ha rupawahini madhyawedi rashid sakur prakasha kale â€œlahoraye nobo da pawathi pakisthanaya ha loka krikat eekabaddha kandayama athara tharagaya narambaimata dinapatha kridanganaya pirennata (wisidahasaka adhika janakayak dinapatha) kridalolin pamina sitiya.
ema wyaparikayinta laba lesa aadayam labenawa.
mage niwasatama pamina fom purawagena gos ma eyata ek kara gannata awashya siyalla ohu itu kaleya.
eeta passe ofis eke wada epa wela thiyena gathiya adu una.

wegawath pithiharambaayaka nirathawu glen makswel pandu 18 kadi haye pahara hatharak saha hathare pahara thunak samagin lakunu 39 k raskalada yuswendra chahalge panduwak hamuwe paswani kadulla lesa ohu dawi giyeya.

deshiya pudgalika aarakshaka samagam sathu thuwakku sandaha, thuwakku aagnya panatha yatathe wana prathipadana prakarawa awashya balapathra nisi aakarawa nikuth kirima sidu kala yuthu bawath, eeta adala warshika badu ayakara ganimada sidu kala yuthu bawada mema komishan sabhawe nirdeshaya we.
eeka apita watinawa.
ekama eka parakwath oyage athe ellila, mama yanna harima baya ara lokuma loku gaha yatin, poddakwath baya na wage awidan yanna...
ekko mama ithama garu karana samahara gathiguna ohuta naha.
rajathuma prashnayak ahaddi sinhasanaya asala dana gasagena inna niladhariyek ee prashnaya ahagena idala rajathumata namaskara karala ee prashnaya payibas ekka wadiwela inna senpathiyekta kiyanawa.
ee samaye rajapakshalage dolapideni walata yata wa siti eeniya madhyakaruwo kihipa denek dan thama hamputhun aaraksha kirima sandaha ballan men udu burannata patan gena thibe.
rata pilibandawa hithawathwa rate sthawarathwaya aaraksha wana widihata katayuthu kirima thamayi wiya hakke.
mama waha handa palanda bankuwata duwami.
kasino athiwath nathiwath hotalay hadanna puluwan.
